PLAY.TITLE: The First Part of Henry the Fourth

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: HENRY PERCY, surnamed HOTSPUR, his son.
SIR MICHAEL, a friend to the Archbishop of York.
LADY PERCY, wife to Hotspur, and sister to Mortimer.
LADY MORTIMER, daughter to Glendower, and wife to Mortimer.
MISTRESS QUICKLY, hostess of a tavern in Eastcheap.
Lords, Officers, Sheriff, Vintner, Chamberlain, Drawers, two Carriers, Travellers, Attendants, and an Ostler.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. London. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING HENRY, LORD JOHN OF LANCASTER, the EARL
of WESTMORELAND, SIR WALTER BLUNT, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. London. An apartment of the Prince's.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter the PRINCE OF WALES and FALSTAFF

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. London. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter the KING, NORTHUMBERLAND, WORCESTER, HOTSPUR,
SIR WALTER BLUNT, with others
Exeunt King Henry, Blunt, and train

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Rochester. An inn yard.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter a Carrier with a lantern in his hand

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The highway, near Gadshill.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Here they rob them and bind them. Exeunt

As they are sharing, the Prince and Poins set upon
them; they all run away; and Falstaff, after a blow
or two, runs away too, leaving the booty behind them

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Warkworth castle
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter HOTSPUR, solus, reading a letter

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. The Boar's-Head Tavern, Eastcheap.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Here they both call him; the drawer stands amazed,
not knowing which way to go

Enter FALSTAFF, GADSHILL, BARDOLPH, and PETO;
FRANCIS following with wine

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PRINCE HENRY
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Exeunt all except PRINCE HENRY and PETO

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PRINCE HENRY
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: He searcheth his pockets, and findeth certain papers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Bangor. The Archdeacon's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter HOTSPUR, WORCESTER, MORTIMER, and GLENDOWER

Glendower speaks to her in Welsh, and she
answers him in the same

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORTIMER
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: The lady speaks again in Welsh

SCENE.STAGEDIR: The lady speaks again in Welsh
Here the lady sings a Welsh song

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. London. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter KING HENRY IV, PRINCE HENRY, and others

SCENE.TITLE: Scene III Eastcheap. The Boar's-Head Tavern.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FALSTAFF
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Enter PRINCE HENRY and PETO, marching, and FALSTAFF
meets them playing on his truncheon like a life

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The rebel camp near Shrewsbury.
SCENE II. A public road near Coventry.
SCENE III. The rebel camp near Shrewsbury.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter HOTSPUR, WORCESTER, DOUGLAS, and VERNON

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. York. The ARCHBISHOP'S palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter the ARCHBISHOP OF YORK and SIR MICHAEL

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING HENRY, PRINCE HENRY, Lord John of
LANCASTER, EARL OF WESTMORELAND, SIR WALTER BLUNT,
and FALSTAFF
Exeunt all but PRINCE HENRY and FALSTAFF

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The rebel camp.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: The trumpets sound. They embrace, and exeunt

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Plain between the camps.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
KING HENRY enters with his power. Alarum to the
battle. Then enter DOUGLAS and SIR WALTER BLUNT

They fight. DOUGLAS kills SIR WALTER BLUNT.
Enter HOTSPUR

PRINCE HENRY draws it out, and finds it to be a
bottle of sack
He throws the bottle at him. Exit

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Alarum. Excursions. Enter PRINCE HENRY, LORD JOHN
OF LANCASTER, and EARL OF WESTMORELAND

They fight. KING HENRY being in danger, PRINCE
HENRY enters

Re-enter DOUGLAS; he fights with FALSTAFF,
who falls down as if he were dead, and exit
DOUGLAS. HOTSPUR is wounded, and falls

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PRINCE HENRY
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: He spieth FALSTAFF on the ground

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Takes up HOTSPUR on his back
Re-enter PRINCE HENRY and LORD JOHN OF LANCASTER

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
The trumpets sound. Enter KING HENRY IV, PRINCE
HENRY, LORD JOHN LANCASTER, EARL OF WESTMORELAND,
with WORCESTER and VERNON prisoners
